title: How to Feed the World Without Damaging the Planet
itunes:title: How to Feed the World Without Damaging the Planet
description:
George Monbiot, Columnist for The Guardian, discusses his book "Regenesis: Feeding the World Without Devouring the Planet." 

Hosts: Tim Stenovec and Kriti Gupta Producer: Sara Livezey

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
